name: Covenants
public_notice: BUIDL, ARTE and UniFi have merged to become OS. https://ethos.eth.link/os.html
additional_notices: Kindly be aware of liquidity-related risks. This notice is not directed at any project in particular, and is more of a cautionary reminder.

description.en: UniFi is a new Decentralized Flexible Organization (DFO) that researches and develops a responsible Decentralized Finance layer on top of Uniswap.
